query.name: start_time
query.description: The timing from when the voucher is valid; so buyer is allowed to claim and to use. Field can only be updated if voucher has not started.

query.name: end_time
query.description: The timing until when the voucher is still valid. Any time after this end_time, buyer is not allowed to claim or to use.

query.name: voucher_type
query.description: The type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: shop voucher, 2: product voucher.

query.name: reward_type
query.description: The reward type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: fix_amount voucher, 2: discount_percentage voucher, 3: coin_cashback voucher.

query.name: usage_quantity
query.description: The number of times for this particular voucher could be used.

query.name: min_basket_price
query.description: The minimum spend required for using this voucher.

query.name: discount_amount
query.description: The discount amount set for this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a fix amount voucher.

query.name: percentage
query.description: The discount percentage set for this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher.

query.name: max_price
query.description: The max amount of discount/value a user can enjoy by using this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher.If no cap limit, can set to be 0.

query.name: display_channel_list
query.description: The FE channel where the voucher will be displayed. The available values are: 1: display_all 3: feed, 4: live streaming, [] (empty - which is hidden).

query.name: item_id_list
query.description: The list of items which is applicable for the voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a product type of voucher.

query.name: display_start_time
query.description: The timing of when voucher is displayed on shop pages; so buyer is allowed to claim.display_start_time must be left empty if the display_channel_list is empty (when voucher is hidden), otherwise it will show error.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

schema.name: voucher_id
schema.description: The unique identifier for the created voucher.

To attract buyers to use your voucher, please increase maximum discount price to > {percentage_input*min_spend*0.01} or reduce minimum basket price to < {max_discount*100/percentage_input} to ensure buyers can enjoy the percentage discount configured.
The total number of ongoing voucher and upcoming voucher cannot exceed 1000.
Voucher cannot be saved as it is lower than {limit}.00%. Please adjust the percentage amount to be more than or equal to {limit}.00%.
Voucher start time is earlier than current time.
Voucher end time must be 1 hour later than the start time.
